description:
As a Knowledge Worker,
I want to use a Moodle system that can store and deploy multimedia content.

As a External User,
I want to use a search engine so that I can find the appropriate knowledge.

As a Knowledge Manager,
I want to develop knowledge maps so that I will be able to identify the intellectual capital.

As a Knowledge Architect,
I want to use a cloud architecture so that the adequate Knowledge System can be available through a web portal.

As a Knowledge Base Developer,
I want to have a Knowledge base so that explicit knowledge stays in the organisation.

As a Employee,
I want to use Office 365 integrated to the KM system so that knowledge can be shared.

As a Data Analyst,
I want to deploy OLAP knowledge reporting so that the KM strategy can be measured.

As a KM Project Manager,
I want to use MS project directly integrated so that KM projects can be driven and monitored.

As a Middle Manager,
I want to have Odoo KM modules installed so that I can have access to the organizational memory in the ERP.

As a Client,
I want to have access to the organizational knowledge through social networks so that I can disseminate it.

As a AI Specialist,
I want to use a dedicated agent expert system so that I can exploit tacit knowledge for decision-making

As a Prompt Engineer,
I want to parametrize GPT-4 so that the reasoning produced is based on your knowledge system.

As a Technical Instructor,
I want to have corporate access to the courses catalog from LinkedIn so that I can organize KM training.

As a Chief Knowledge Officer,
I want to benefit from a knowledge executive dashboard so that I can produce balanced scorecards for KM.

As a Information Expert,
I want to use Data Warehouse so that the Knowledge Base can be compared & consolidated with external ressources.
